nodes.text: Message to Spacers 4: Loronar E-9 Explorer

Message to Spacers 4: Loronar E-9 Explorer was the fourth article in the Message to Spacers series of articles that was posted on Wizards.com for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was written by Patrick Stutzman and published on September 11, 2008. The article featured the E-9 Explorer.
